column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////hank you for your review
column2: Megan. We apologize for our delayed response to your feedback. We would love the opportunity to speak with you more directly about your past experience with us. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our management team will be in contact with you. Again
column3: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
